OCI-Lob->tell

(PHP 5, PECL OCI8 >= 1.1.0)

OCI-Lob->tell — Returns the current position of internal pointer of large object

Description

int OCI-Lob::tell ( void )

Gets the current position of a LOB's internal pointer.

Return Values

Returns current position of a LOB's internal pointer or FALSE if an error occurred.

See Also

  • OCI-Lob->rewind
  • OCI-Lob->size
  • OCI-Lob->eof
